attr.pathogenesis: replication in rapidly dividing cells, villous atrophy, malabsorption
attr.complications: dehydration, electrolyte abnormalities, destruction of immune system

reference: Canine parvovirus - an overview | ScienceDirect Topics - https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/veterinary-science-and-veterinary-medicine/canine-parvovirus

attr.source: believed to have arisen from feline panleukopenia virus
